thread.section_title: YesStyle.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of YesStyle.com | www.yesstyle.com
thread.title: Carolene

author: Carolene
title: Carolene
text: The details provided for the dress that I had ordered had very little descriptions on it. There were information about the dress on the pictures provided, but they were in Japanese. This dress is hopefully for my prom dress if I like the material of the dress. I was a bit hesitant on ordering the dress because again the detail portion that was in English was very small. Though overall I was very satisfied with the pictures, prices and the variety of dresses. I will be buying from here again in the future.
